actions.text: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Snowbarger to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Snowbarger amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases the punishment options available to judges in sentencing those convicted of violations of Federal campaign laws; and allows the Justice Department to initiate investigations without having to wait for a referral from the FEC.
purpose: An amendment to add a new title providing for enhancement of enforcement of campaign law.
